response.skills: Daily Reports, Daily Operations, Team Coordination, Leadership, Teamwork, Customer Service, Problem Solving, Project Planning, Mechanical Design, ISO 9001, Quality Management, Manufacturing, Project Management, Sales, Sales Operations, Welding, Nondestructive Testing (NDT), Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office

profile_positions.description:
- Maintenance in state-of-the-art Level D Full Flight Simulators and MFTD manufactured by CAE.
- Performing Preventive and Corrective maintenance of B787, A320/330, ATR-72 Simulators, Morning Readiness Check.
- Knowledge of QTG interpretation, preparing simulators for re-evaluation by planning QTG reruns, evaluation & preparation of maintenance records for the authority.
- Carrying out troubleshooting in several systems such as Visual, Motion, C/L, Avionics, Electrical and Host computer.
- Carrying out EGPWS, NavDB, Lesson Plan & OIT updates.
- Customer Operation Support (Simulator, Briefing rooms)
- Establish Field Service Benefits (FSB) process, review and implementation.
- Performing Visual tuning and Pushback alignment.
- Carrying out projector replacement and DDAT. BARCO FL-35, Sony VPHL.

Creation and implementation of procedure to easy replacement of rz files between simulators reducing maintenance time related to creation of radioaids.
Support engineer to rearrange and to control all the maintenance tasks in Gemini platform.
profile_positions.title: Flight Simulator Technician II

profile_positions.description: Sharing Knowledge. Differential calculus and math tutor. Providing tutoring services for school students.
profile_positions.title: Academic Tutor
